docs.snippet: Seth Smith and Chase Headley homered, and Yonder Alonso hit a three-run double to lead the San Diego Padres to a 9-8 victory against the Cleveland Indians in their spring training finale Saturday at the University of San Diego's Fowler Park....
docs.lead_paragraph: Seth Smith and Chase Headley homered, and Yonder Alonso hit a three-run double to lead the San Diego Padres to a 9-8 victory against the Cleveland Indians in their spring training finale Saturday at the University of San Diego's Fowler Park.

headline.main: Smith, Headley Homer as Padres Beat Indians 9-8
headline.print_headline: Smith, Headley Homer as Padres Beat Indians 9-8
